subject: CALL FOR PAPER FOR VOLUME 6, ISSUE 7 FOR THE MONTH OF JULY 2019 (INDEXED:THOMSON REUTERS ENDNOTE)
body:
*Dear Author/Researcher,* *Global Journal of Engineering Science and Research Management **(GJESRM, ISSN **2349-4506**),* We are pleased to inform you that GJESRM is going to launch its upcoming issue for the month of *July*, 2019. We would like to invite you to contribute a Research Paper for publication in GJESRM for International Journal. GJESRM covers all areas of *Computer Science, Electronics Engineering, Information Technology, *and all other streams of *science* and *Management* for our International Journal. We publish original research articles, review articles and technical notes. *Invites you to submit your research paper for publishing in * *Volume 6, Issue 7 (JULY - 2019)* INDEXED IN THOMSON REUTER *ENDNOTE: **ResearcherID:**D-6904-2018* *http://www.researcherid.com/rid/D-6904-2018 * The journal reviews papers within one week of submission and publishes accepted articles on the internet immediately upon receiving the final versions. The articles should be in proper format as in the sample format. *FOR ONLINE SUBMISSION MANUSCRIPT* *http://www.gjesrm.com/submit_manuscript_online.php * Authors are invited to submit the paper online or through E-mail at *Infogjesrm@gmail.com* Submissions must be original and should not have been submitted or published previously anywhere else for publication. *Important Dates:* *·Paper Submission: 05 July 2019.* ·Review Results (Acceptance/Rejection) Notification: Within 02 Days after submitting paper. *·Published Online on : 10 July 2019.* *Publication Charges:* *Indian Author(s)* Rs 1500/- upto 3 authors, after 3 authors charges will be Rs 500/author Rs 300/author for Hard copy of certificate. *Foreign Author(s)* $ 80 USD upto 6 Authors *Editor in Chief:* *GLOBAL JOURNAL OF ENGINEERING SCIENCES AND RESEARCH MANAGEMENT (GJESRM, ISSN 2349-4506),* *Website: www.gjesrm.com * *Paper Submission Email: infogjesrm@gmail.com * *For any Query, Please feel free to contact at: infogjesrm@gmail.com *
Dear Author/Researcher,

Global Journal of Engineering Science and Research Management (GJESRM, ISSN 2349-4506),    

We are pleased to inform you that GJESRM is going to launch its upcoming issue for the month of July, 2019. We would like to invite you to contribute a Research Paper for publication in GJESRM for International Journal. GJESRM covers all areas of Computer Science, Electronics Engineering, Information Technology, and all other streams of science and Management for our International Journal. We publish original research articles, review articles and technical notes.

Invites you to submit your research paper for publishing in   Volume 6, Issue 7 (JULY - 2019)

INDEXED IN THOMSON REUTER ENDNOTE: ResearcherID:D-6904-2018  

http://www.researcherid.com/rid/D-6904-2018  


The journal reviews papers within one week of submission and publishes accepted articles on the internet immediately upon receiving the final versions. The articles should be in proper format as in the sample format.

FOR ONLINE SUBMISSION MANUSCRIPT

http://www.gjesrm.com/submit_manuscript_online.php

Authors are invited to submit the paper online or through E-mail at Infogjesrm@gmail.com Submissions must be original and should not have been submitted or published previously anywhere else for publication.

Important Dates:

·Paper Submission:   05 July 2019.

·Review Results (Acceptance/Rejection) Notification: Within 02  Days after submitting paper.

·Published Online on : 10 July 2019.

Publication Charges:

Indian Author(s)

Rs 1500/- upto 3 authors, after 3 authors charges will be Rs 500/author 

Rs 300/author for Hard copy of certificate.

Foreign Author(s)

$ 80 USD upto 6 Authors 


Editor in Chief:
GLOBAL JOURNAL OF ENGINEERING SCIENCES AND RESEARCH MANAGEMENT (GJESRM, ISSN 2349-4506),

Website: www.gjesrm.com

Paper Submission Email: infogjesrm@gmail.com

For any Query, Please feel free to contact at: infogjesrm@gmail.com
